lead_paragraph: A man has been arrested for trying to extinguish the Olympic torch by throwing a bucket of water over it as it passed through his farming town of Maracaju in central Brazil, an officer at the local police station said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Man Arrested in Brazil for Attempt to Douse Olympic Torch
headline.main: Man Arrested in Brazil for Attempt to Douse Olympic Torch
